item.title: One way sign facing wrong way, 28th August
item.description:
One way street sign has been twisted to face the wrong way, leading to multiple vehicles turnihg onto Frith Street into oncoming traffic. It should be facing towards old Compton Street to prevent traffic turning. Issue has been present for a week according to local bar staff
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 23, Frith Street, City of Westminster
